mapper.select: select c_seq, c_rgb, c_name from t_color
mapper.insert: insert into t_palette(pl_c1, pl_c2, pl_c3, pl_c4, pl_c5) values (#{pl_c1}, #{pl_c2}, #{pl_c3}, #{pl_c4}, #{pl_c5})
mapper.select: select i_seq, i_rgb1, i_rgb2, i_rgb3, i_rgb4, i_rgb5, i_colorname1, i_colorname2, i_colorname3, i_colorname4, i_colorname5 from t_interior
mapper.insert: insert into t_palette(pl_c1, pl_c2, pl_c3, pl_c4, pl_c5) values (#{pl_c1}, #{pl_c2}, #{pl_c3}, #{pl_c4}, #{pl_c5})
